name: 2021 (PositionV) (PositionV)
description:
Welcome to my 2021 project.

An Idle, relax and chilling game where you can relax, chill and let the computer kill enemies for you. 

There will be chest that spawns around the map. Chest will give you a random reward. There are two kinds of chest. Sliver chest, Magic chest.

Sword exp can level up your sword level. Once you leveled up your sword there is a chance of you obtaining a damage booster.

Available

The game is available on PC. I am planning to release it to more platforms in the future.

Feedbacks

You can leave a feedback comment in the "Comment section". Any feedbacks / tips will be appreciated.
